Sekali lagi kami ucapan terima kasih karena telah memberikan waktu dan komentar terbaik Anda untuk kami agar menjadi lebih baik di kedatangan Anda berikutnya.

Kindest regards,
Muh Nur Assdiddiq
General Manager

text: Aku mau review sedikit mengenai hotel ini, mulai dari tempatnya, fasilitas dan pelayanannya. Mereka pun disiplin menjalankan protokol kesehatan dari pemerintah. title: Review

text: Menginap di kamar tipe deluxe (801)..kamarnya bagus, bersih dan luas, dari kamar bisa melihat ke arah jalan utama yg recommended banget saat malam dan bisa menikmati pemandangan sunrise pagi dari kaca jendela kamar....breakfastnya enak dan banyak varian menunya..kamar mandi juga bagus dan peralatan kemasan amenities yg terbungkus rapi.. di masa pandemic seperti sekarang di best western kindai hotel juga tersedia disinfectan box, pengecekan suhu tubuh, tersedia hand sanitizer, staff memakai masker, sarung tangan dan juga face shield.. jadi kalo nginep merasa aman..

text:
I stayed in the hotel one night as my friend gave me a gift for winning an event. I am impressed with the hotel service and how neat it looks, from the lobby, bedroom and the hall, the place is so comfy to stay. 

The staffs are helpful and very kind when i ask some facilities I can use in the hotel. One of them is guests are able to swim in the top floor. It has small-ish pool with nice view of Banjarmasin city. It also has a bar with live-music at night.

There is free shuttle transportation too for visiting the biggest mosque in the city and mall for guests that can use in scheduled time, its nice addition for those who want to go outside hotel. The location near hotel has many food stores and it resides in the main road of city. 

One thing I am the impressed most are the breakfast service, it has ton or variety food and what surprises me that they provide the most traditional dishes from Banjar cuisine. The food are tasty and its what all you can get type. 

In the end, I really like to staying in this hotel. Its great to take a rest here and I guess this what I can recommend to everyone who want decide before staying here. Its good experience overall.
title: One of recommended hotel in Banjarmasin

text: I stayed here for 5 nights in November 2018 and I loved it. Rooms are very nice, restaurant is good and what I like the most was the way the hotel staff takes care of you. They really treat you like a dear guest. The General Manager was particularly a very kind professional who even provided us a complimentary car when we inquired about the big mosque of the city for visiting. The only thing that needs improvement might be to add at least one or two dishes of the South Asian or Arabic food to its menu as it is too Indonesian!! full of rice and fish and sometimes it becomes hard to have it all the times. It might be a very personal taste though!
title: A Hotel you feel like at home.

text: Lobby spacious, Room Large and fantastic, Have a smooking room, Food in the restaurant was great and cheap. Staff friendly and Helpfull, 24 hours minimarket open beside the hotel. a lot Parking space.
title: Great Hotel in Town

text:
Less than a year old. Everything is pristine. The room was well designed with a very comfortable bed and excellent customer service. The breakfast was superb, extremely well presented and very tasty. All staff made hotel very welcoming.

Coming to Banjarmasin for work, but this hotel made the experience very enjoyable! I would highly recommend this hotel.
title: Best hotel in Banjarmasin!

text:
This hotel is brilliant.  Our family stayed here on our way home following the earthquake on Lombok.  We found the hotel to be very comfortable.  The staff were so helpful and kind too us and made sure that we had everything we needed and helped us organise flights and taxis etc.   Food was brilliant.

Definitely recommended.
title: Wonderful stay

text: Was a pleasant experience stay during my short business trip as this was a new hotel just opened on in Feb 2018. Very friendly staffs and helpful. The room and hotel are so cleaned and well managed. The food selection were still lacking for in room service. The breakfast was great with variety of delicious choices.
title: Great Comfy and clean hotel

text: I was staying for one night here and overall experience was amazing. Staffs are very helpful, friendly and skillful. They are managed to show the true services of a 4-star hotel. I like the decor anyway, it's so local and informative. Breakfast buffet was so delicious and they served excellent local food as well. I was surprised to know that the GM, Mr. Saeno was in charge during breakfast, served the guest and made delicious omelette. For me, that is one example of a true leader. Thank you "Mr. Supriadi" at the FO, Mr. Asdiq, Mr. Saeno and all staffs for your warm welcome during my stay at Best Western Kindai..
title: Great services and facilities

text:
Nagelneues Hotel zum fairen Preis.
 Das Frühstücksbuffet ist der Wahnsinn, so eine Auswahl gibt es selten. Der Pool auf dem Dach ist sauber und sehr gepflegt. Die Zimmer sind groß schön und sauber!

Wir haben uns mit dem Staff super Verstanden! Parmin ist mit uns sogar zum Floating Market mitgekommen obwohl er frei hatte!

Viele Grüße an Parmin, Adam und Asdiq es war echt toll mit euch, bleibt wie ihr seid, dann kann das Hotel nur ein Erfolg sein!

Greetings to Parmin, Adam and Asiq you are great! We enjoyed our stay really much! Hope to see you maybe again :-)
title: Super Hotel mit sehr nettem Personal
